title: Oru Vaanavillin Pakkathilae lyrics kadhal solla vandhaen Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers      : Udit Narayan
Composer : Yuvan Shankar Raja


Oru Vaanavillin Pakkathilae
Vaazhdhu Paarkiren Naanae
En Vaasal Mattum Nanaikum
Mazhaiyaai Paarkiraenae
Ennai Sotta Sotta Nanaiyavaithaai
Nenjai Kittatatta Karayavaithaayae
Aval Azhagenum Nathiyil Vizhugiraen Thunaiyaai
Ennai Urumaatrinaai, Kaathal Kathai Aaetrinaai

Oru Vaanavillin Pakkathilae ....

Netru Varaiyil Naan Kaatru Veesinaal
Nindru Rasithadhu Illai..
Viralgal Koarkaiyil Viruppam Koduthidum
Neruppil Erinthadhu Illai..
Thottu Paesinaal Evano Aagiraen..
Unnai Vittu Pirigaiyil Konjamaai Saagiraen..
Mithakiraen Parakiraen Maegathai Pidikiraen
Arugilae Santhiya Yogathil Kuthikiraen
Ithupothum Pennae Ithupothum

Oru Vaanavillin Pakkathilae ...

Ithupothum Pennae Ithupothum
Ithupothum Pennae Ithupothum
Enga Nadakiraen Etharku Sirikiraen
Vazhathai Marakkiraen Naanae..
Kudaigal Irunthumae Mazhaiyil Nanaivathu
Kaathal Vanthapin Thaanae..

Thanthai Arugilae Ithuvarai Thoonginaen
Thannan Thanimaiyai Indru Naan Virumbinaen
Ithu Enna Ilamaigal Nadathidum Mothala
Ithayathil Kothikkira Kazhichalae Kaathala
Ithupothum Pennae Ithupothum

Oru Vaanavillin Pakkathilae ...
